name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>39229819

“What's up?” Nel asks. “This place givin' you the creeps?”

“Something like that... I've just got a bad feeling.” You move forward, sword ready. The walls are washed out, all the same way. This is where that picture was taken, or painted—you're not sure, anymore. The air feels heavy; that scraping sound propagates downward from above, echoing through the walls, and you're almost certain you hear whispering. “Mind taking your hand off my shoulder?”

“What? I'm not touching...” Nel looks up at you, and you turn a bit to face him—then, immediately stagger forward when you notice him standing with his own weapons at the ready, whirling around on a heel and pointing your sword at thin air.

The black room is empty and featureless.

> Other
